articles.title: Reddit kicks out moderators, takes over one of the biggest protesting subreddits - HT Tech
articles.description: Reddit has taken over r/malefashionadvice, a subreddit with 5.4 million members, and has removed all the moderators that were keeping the subreddit private to protest against the company’s API changes.
articles.content: Reddit protests have been going on for more than a month now over the company's API pricing changes. Over the course of this period, many third-party applications shut down their operations citing th… [+1931 chars]

articles.title: Early humans were skilled in weapon woodworking - Tech Explorist
articles.description: A study on double-pointed wooden throwing sticks.
articles.content: A 300,000-year-old hunting weapon discovered in Schöningen, Germany, reveals that early humans were skilled woodworkers. The double-pointed wooden throwing stick, unearthed in 1994, was scraped, seas… [+2653 chars]

articles.title: Asteroid alert! NASA tracks 5 space rocks approaching Earth at breakneck speeds - HT Tech
articles.description: 5 asteroids varying in size are set to get very close to Earth in the next few days. NASA has tracked these space rocks and revealed details such as their size, distance and speed. Here’s all you need to know about it.
